mean_cn: v. 放弃，让出（权利，财产等），撤回
mean_en: to give up (something) :to give (something, such as power, control, or possession) to another person or group
sentence: The army relinquished their control over the airport due to running out of food supplies.
sentence_trans: 因为食物耗尽，这支军队放弃了对机场的控制。
word_etyma: re向后，相反+linqu离开+ish动词后缀→离开不再要→放弃
